articles.title: Yes, April CPI was lower than expected, but 'don’t get too carried away' - ForexLive
articles.description: The US CPI data was slightly better than expected, and its a bit too late to say don't get carried away: . Forexlive Americas FX news wrap 15 May: Green grass ahead as CPI/spending is tame Comments...
